summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Technician Panel for OEM Service Records. All 18 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI verified for ServiceHistory.js page including Add Service modal, OEM Warranty Service selection with auto-locked fields, OEM Details section, Service Detail modal, and filter dropdowns.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/admin/services/options - returns all dropdown options
Backend: POST /api/admin/services - create internal service with minimal fields
Backend: POST /api/admin/services - create OEM warranty service with oem_details
Backend: Validation - OEM service requires oem_details object
Backend: Validation - OEM service requires oem_name
Backend: Validation - OEM service requires oem_case_number
Backend: Validation - OEM service requires oem_warranty_type
Backend: Validation - OEM service requires case_raised_date
Backend: Validation - OEM service requires case_raised_via
Backend: OEM service auto-locks service_responsibility to 'oem'
Backend: OEM service auto-locks counts_toward_amc to false
Backend: GET /api/admin/services - list services without filters
Backend: GET /api/admin/services - filter by service_category
Backend: GET /api/admin/services - filter by status
Backend: GET /api/admin/services - filter by device_id
Backend: PUT /api/admin/services/{id} - update basic fields
Backend: PUT /api/admin/services/{id} - update to OEM category with auto-lock
Backend: Service closure requires resolution_summary
Backend: Service closure with outcome sets is_closed and closed_at
Backend: Closed service records cannot be modified
Frontend: ServiceHistory.js page loads with stats cards (Total, Internal, OEM, Open)
Frontend: Add Service Record button opens modal
Frontend: Service Classification section with Category, Status, Responsibility, Role, Billing Impact
Frontend: Selecting 'OEM Warranty Service' shows OEM Details section
Frontend: OEM fields auto-locked (Responsibility=OEM, Role=Coordinator, Billing=Warranty Covered)
Frontend: Auto-locked warning message displayed for OEM services
Frontend: OEM Details section has all required fields (OEM Name, Case Number, Warranty Type, etc.)
Frontend: Service detail modal displays OEM details correctly
Frontend: Service detail modal shows attachment warning for OEM services
Frontend: Filter dropdowns work (Category, Status, Device)
Frontend: Stats cards update dynamically based on filters

seed_data_verified.service_records: Multiple service records exist including OEM Warranty and Internal Service types
seed_data_verified.devices: 35 devices available for service record creation

context_for_next_testing_agent: Technician Panel for OEM Service Records fully tested and working. Backend has 18 passing tests covering all CRUD operations, OEM validation rules, auto-locking, filters, and closure workflow. Frontend verified for ServiceHistory.js page with Add Service modal, OEM Details section, Service Detail modal, and filter dropdowns. All APIs are real - no mocked endpoints. Test data created with TEST_ prefix for easy identification.
